action.action-desc: Ms. Scholten introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To provide that the Commissioner of Labor Statistics may be removed only with proof of inefficiency, neglect of duty, or malfeasance in office.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Facts First Act.

section.header: Limitation on removal of Commissioner of Labor Statistics
section.text: Section 2 of the Act of June 13, 1888, entitled An act to establish a department of Labor (25 Stat. 182; 29 U.S.C. 3) is amended by adding at the end the following: The Commissioner may be removed only with proof of inefficiency, neglect of duty, or malfeasance in office..
